post.author: 김세환
post.content:
Your personal concern is understood well, however, the job market

here is not so good.

There are a lot of people looking for a job , but it is very

depressing now. 

Even if you have a good skill set, come here with a hope of

getting a job , things may not be that easy as you may imagine.

Getting a job is one thing, but surviving is on a job is

sometimes another challenge because of the communication problem

which is a big barrier to cope with to a new comer.

Therefore a lot of people are even considering a career change

because of immediate needs such as a financial problem to survive and

a bad job prospects.

Maybe I am being too pessimistic, however, please consider all

those facts carefully before you decide to do anything. 

Also USE ALL INFOMATION SOURCES to help your decision.

Let me remind you that this is my PERSONAL opinion, NOT necessarily

it is all correct and right.

I hope you come with a good decision and plan.

Thanks.

SK
